net.bluebones.boggle
Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
  net.bluebones.boggle.Player
      net.bluebones.boggle.HumanPlayer

public class HumanPlayer
extends Player

Represents the entire client side of Boggle.

Version:
0.3 $Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Thomas David Baker
